ingredients.ingredient: 1 prepared angel food cake, cut into chunks
1 (12 ounce) package frozen peach slices, chopped
2 (16 ounce) tubs reduced-fat frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Layer cake pieces and fruit alternately, starting and ending with whipped topping for a beautiful presentation
Partially thaw frozen berries so they release juices that flavor the cake layers
Assemble trifle 2-3 hours before serving so flavors meld and cake absorbs fruit juices
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you layer and time this dessert to create color contrast and ensure the cake absorbs enough fruit flavor without becoming soggy?
